title: Into the Mists: Creating Shadow and Fortune

replies.body: So after all these stories when are the skins coming out..?{{champion:222}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:80}}
i feel like the multi-headed ghost could be a new ward{{item:3340}}
Some high resolution pictures of the artwork would be awesome, especially the wide-shot of Bilgewater. Looks so cool.

So whats the connection between the stories and summoners rift, for example, being summon-able champions who fight in the rift, shouldn't {{champion:21}} , {{champion:236}} ,{{champion:120}}  and {{champion:412}}  all know, or at least know of each other already? on that point, shouldn't {{champion:21}}  know {{champion:41}} Survived? Whats the relation and or explanation?

The game itself and the lore are separate now.
Before, all these champs went to the institute of war to smack each other around about once every three days.
Now the institute isn't even a thing any more.
Not every champ knows about every other champ any more.
What about Illaoi, since there's a pbe voice thing does that make her a new champion? Or is she only ever gonna appear in lore?

This is a fantastic story and i loved reading it, i cant wait for the next one!!!

however i think that thresh and karthus' lore changes were a bit weak! i mean thresh inst even a warden anymore, so how can his title be 'the chain warden'?

hw went from a sadistic prision warden hung by his own chains and now returned to wreak havoc.
To a petty guard of magic objects who spent his time scratching mirrors and torturing one person, and then some spirit thing happened and he because thresh...

and karthus' one was like "ALL HAIL KINDRED, oh shit... this is supposed to be about karthus.. ummmm ahhh oh right he went to the shadow isles, some magic happened and viola! karthus! ALL HAIL KINDRED"
while i love kindred so much karthus was the original grim reaper even though he technically wasnt it.
true. found karthus and thresh kinda boring stories. sorry riot.
I want a development in the ninja's lore. Zed,Akali etc

I think League should make the new champion select show the other players what skin you have, and i think there should be specofic masteries for champions (which will be based on mastery level)  like the actual mastery system that is based on summoner level

Love this story thing. Finally it feels the character's stories are becoming dynamic.Their lore is changing not because of an update, but to reflect events that have "actually happened". Can't wait to see more of this. Well done Riot :)
when are the skins being released?
